projects.title: Quantum Realms VR
projects.shortDescription: An immersive VR experience that takes players through different quantum dimensions. Built with advanced physics simulation and spatial audio.
projects.detailedDescription: Quantum Realms VR is a groundbreaking virtual reality experience that combines cutting-edge physics simulation with immersive storytelling. Players navigate through multiple quantum dimensions, each with unique physical properties and visual aesthetics. The project features advanced particle systems, real-time ray tracing, and spatial audio that responds to quantum field fluctuations.

projects.title: Neon Runner
projects.shortDescription: A fast-paced cyberpunk endless runner with procedural level generation and dynamic lighting effects.
projects.detailedDescription: Neon Runner combines the thrill of endless running with a cyberpunk aesthetic and advanced procedural generation. The game features dynamic lighting systems that react to player actions, procedurally generated levels that ensure no two runs are the same, and a progression system that unlocks new abilities and visual effects. The game's shader work creates a distinctive neon-soaked visual style that immerses players in a futuristic cityscape.

challenges: Balancing procedural generation with engaging level design

Creating smooth 60fps gameplay on various mobile hardware

projects.title: Medieval VR Forge
projects.shortDescription: A VR blacksmithing simulator with realistic physics and haptic feedback. Players can craft weapons and tools in a medieval setting.
projects.detailedDescription: Medieval VR Forge offers an authentic blacksmithing experience in virtual reality, complete with realistic metal physics, temperature simulation, and haptic feedback. Players heat metal in a forge, shape it with hammers and anvils, and quench it in water to create medieval weapons and tools. The game features a comprehensive crafting system with over 100 different items to create, each requiring specific techniques and timing.

projects.title: Space Colony Builder
projects.shortDescription: A strategic colony management game set on Mars. Features complex resource management and environmental challenges.
projects.detailedDescription: Space Colony Builder challenges players to establish and maintain a thriving colony on Mars. The game features complex resource management systems, environmental hazards like dust storms and equipment failures, and a tech tree that spans from basic survival to advanced terraforming. Players must balance power generation, life support, food production, and colonist happiness while expanding their base and conducting scientific research.

challenges: Creating engaging progression over long play sessions
Optimizing simulation performance for large colonies

projects.title: AR Furniture Visualizer
projects.shortDescription: An augmented reality app that allows users to visualize furniture in their real environment before purchasing.
projects.detailedDescription: AR Furniture Visualizer revolutionizes online furniture shopping by allowing customers to place 3D furniture models in their real environment using augmented reality. The app features accurate scale detection, realistic lighting and shadows, and a comprehensive catalog of furniture from major retailers. Users can save room configurations, share them with others, and make informed purchasing decisions.
